text: I apologize for my tardiness today. Unfortunately, I encountered some unforeseen traffic on the way caused by a minor accident.
proof:
-----------------------------------

**Traffic Incident Report**

Report Number: TR-20230415-0001
Date and Time: April 15, 2023, 8:45 AM
Location: Interstate 95 North, Mile Marker 123

Incident Description:

At approximately 8:45 AM, a minor accident occurred on the northbound lane of Interstate 95 at mile marker 123. The incident involved two vehicles, resulting in traffic congestion and significant delays for several hours.

The accident was caused by a driver who lost control due to wet road conditions, causing one vehicle to collide with another. No serious injuries were reported, but the vehicles required tow trucks to remove them from the scene.

Traffic was diverted to the shoulder lanes, and the affected area was closed for approximately 2 hours while emergency services responded and cleared the scene. Traffic returned to normal by 10:45 AM.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused, and we appreciate your patience during this incident. For real-time traffic updates, please visit our website or follow us on social media.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
Traffic Management Department
[City, State]
[Phone Number]
[Email Address]

text: I'm really sorry, but I can't make it to dinner tonight. Something unexpected came up and I need to take care of it personally. Hopefully, we can catch up soon!
proof:
---------------------------------------------------
**Subject:** Unexpected Situation - Cancellation of Dinner Plan
**From:** [Your Name] <[your_email@example.com>]
**To:** [Their Name] <[their_email@example.com>]
**Date:** [Current Date]

Dear [Their Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to inform you that I regretfully will not be able to make it to our dinner plans tonight. An unexpected situation has arisen, requiring my immediate attention and personal care.

I have attached a call log as proof of my unavoidable commitment. Please find the relevant details below:

**Call Log Details:**
- Call Time: [Current Date] [Specific Time]
- Call Duration: Approximately 1 hour
- Call Recipient: [Name of the person involved in the unexpected situation]
- Call Type: Emergency call (911)

I deeply apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding. I am truly disappointed that we will not be able to meet tonight, but I hope we can reschedule our get-together soon.

Thank you for your patience and understanding in this matter.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
